hibernate-mapping.query: select l from DataCenterLocationDetails l where l.dataCenterLocationId = ?
select l from DataCenterLocationDetails l left join fetch l.parentLocation pl where l.dataCenterLocationId = ?
select l.code from DataCenterLocationDetails l where l.dataCenterLocationId = ?
select l.dataCenterLocationId from DataCenterLocationDetails l where l.code <> 'Site' and l.code <> 'Building' and l.code <> 'Floor'
select l from DataCenterLocationDetails l where l.componentTypeLookup.lkpValueCode = ?
select l from DataCenterLocationDetails l where l.defaultSite = true
update DataCenterLocationDetails l set l.defaultSite = ? where l.dataCenterLocationId <> ?
